MLE_Training_Package package

Submodules

MLE_Training_Package.ingest_data module

The nonstandardcode contains the entire process. The data is downloaded and split into test and train dataset. Trained under different models. The best parameters were identified through RandomizedSearchCV

src.MLE_Training_Package.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ageron/handson-ml/master/datasets/housing/housing.tgz', housing_path='../datasets/housing')[source]

It downloads the data as zip file and extracts it

housing_urlstring

The url to download the data

housing_pathstring

The path to store the data

src.MLE_Training_Package.ingest_data.get_housing_data(dataset_file_name)[source]

It loads the data and returns it as a dataframe

dataset_file_namestring

Name of the dataset

dataframe : panda dataframe returns the dataframe of the data

src.MLE_Training_Package.ingest_data.load_housing_data(dataset_file_name, housing_path='../datasets/housing')[source]

It loads the data and returns it as a dataframe

dataset_file_namestring

Name of the dataset

housing_pathstring

The path to retrieve the data

dataframe : panda dataframe returns the dataframe of the data

MLE_Training_Package.score module

src.MLE_Training_Package.score.calc_score(housing_prepared, housing_labels, strat_train_set, strat_test_set, imputer)[source]

It finds the best parameters using RandomizedSearchCV

housing_prepared: dataframe housing_labels: dataframe strat_train_set: dataframe strat_test_set: dataframe imputer : singleImputer Object

rmse : float returns the Root Mean Square Error
